labels.name: composite-issue

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body:
Note: consider work went into Cosmos querying capabilities, and so the below doesn't include those improvements; see #33033 for Cosmos work done in 9.0, including all query improvements.

## SQL optimizations

* #31083
    * #32668 
* #32784
    * #32757
* #31482
* Min/Max (GREATEST/LEAST) work
    * #27794
    * #31681
    * #32332
    * #32458
* #34142
* #34133 
* Optimization of CASE/WHEN
    * #18774
    * #33869
    * #18935
    * #33934
* Optimization of COALESCE 
    * #34002
    * #33938 
    * #34304
* #33873
* #33814
* #33776
* #34381

## New translations

* #33491
* #32058
* #33706
* #16645
* #27794
* #28899
* #33702
* #33891
* #33721

## Provider-specific

* #34256
* #34124
* #34080
* #34168
* #34213

A big thank you goes out to @ranma42 for many of the above!
